results.title: Morning Minute: Washington Just Gave Crypto the Green Light
results.description: It was a big day for crypto policy in the US yesterday, but work still remains to be done

results.title: What role is left for decentralized GPU networks in AI?
results.description: AI training is dominated by hyperscale data centers, but inference and everyday workloads are opening real space for decentralized GPU networks.

results.title: Binance to Move $1 Billion User Protection Fund Into Bitcoin
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Binance to Move $1 Billion User Protection Fund Into Bitcoin As the bitcoin price slumps, Binance said it will convert the $1 billion stablecoin-backed Secure Asset Fund for Users entirely into bitcoin over the next 30 days. This post Binance to Move $1 Billion User Protection Fund Into Bitcoin first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Bitcoin bear market almost over? BTC price metric outpaces 2022 bottom
results.description: Bitcoin's MVRV Z-score printed record lows on a rolling two-year basis, making BTC price more "undervalued" than at the pit of past bear markets.

results.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
results.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

results.title: Trump picks crypto-friendly Kevin Warsh as new Fed chair
results.description: US President Donald Trump nominated former Fed Governor Kevin Warsh to replace Jerome Powell as Federal Reserve chair, setting up a Senate confirmation fight.

results.title: Ethereum loses $2.8K support as charts point to possible 22% downside
results.description: Ethereum slipped under $2,800 as charts and onchain data suggested downside risk remains elevated, with a potential move toward $2,100.

results.title: Trump Names Bitcoin-Friendly Kevin Warsh as Pick for Federal Reserve Chair
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Trump Names Bitcoin-Friendly Kevin Warsh as Pick for Federal Reserve Chair President Donald Trump announced pro-bitcoin Kevin Warsh as his nominee to serve as chairman of the Federal Reserve, confirming speculation from prediction markets. This post Trump Names Bitcoin-Friendly Kevin Warsh as Pick for Federal Reserve Chair first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Bitcoin, Ether ETFs see $1B outflows as crypto market tumbles 6%
results.description: US spot Bitcoin ETF flows turned negative for January after a series of outflows this week totaling nearly $1 billion, data from SoSoValue shows.

results.title: There is no trust in DeFi without proper risk management
results.description: DeFi's composability creates cascading exploit risks while protocols handle risk idiosyncratically. Institutional adoption demands TradFi-style standardized frameworks.

results.title: Trump says shutdown deal near, but markets remain on edge
results.description: A tentative deal in Washington has eased some shutdown fears, but with key votes still pending, crypto, gold and silver are trading through liquidity jitters and foreign policy risk.

results.title: Vitalik Buterin earmarks $45M in ETH for privacy and open-source infrastructure
results.description: The move comes as the Ethereum Foundation enters a period of “mild austerity” while sticking to its core technical roadmap, Buterin said.

results.title: Bitcoin's 'miner exodus' could push BTC price below $60K
results.description: Still, Bitcoin often rebounds toward its energy value after long downtrends, with one model pointing to a fair price near $121,000.

results.title: Bitcoin ETFs Shed $817M as BTC Hits Nine-Month Low
results.description: Bitcoin’s crash to a nine-month low, coupled with growing uncertainty about macroeconomic policy, catalyzed $817 million in ETF outflows.

results.title: Former Google Engineer Convicted of Stealing AI Secrets for China
results.description: A U.S. jury found Linwei Ding guilty of economic espionage and trade secret theft after he stole Google’s sensitive AI infrastructure data.

results.title: Democrats Press DOJ Deputy Over Crypto Holdings, Enforcement Retreat
results.description: A group of Democratic senators is pressing the Justice Department over ethics questions tied to a rollback in crypto enforcement.

results.title: Bitcoin Slips to $82K as Liquidations Spike to $1.7B
results.description: Bitcoin has hit a nine-month low of $82,134 amid escalating policy shifts, including President Trump's Friday Fed Chair announcement.

results.title: Tech Giants Circle OpenAI in Funding Round That Could Top $100 Billion
results.description: Amazon’s talks could make it one of OpenAI’s biggest backers as the AI company continues to forge ahead with plans for an IPO this year.

results.title: US Finalizes Forfeiture of $400 Million Tied to Helix Darknet Mixer
results.description: The mixer processed hundreds of millions of dollars in Bitcoin that prosecutors say were tied to illicit activity on the dark web.

results.title: Strategy, BitMine Stock Prices Dive as Bitcoin and Ethereum Sink
results.description: Leading crypto treasury firms BitMine and Strategy both saw their stocks plunge nearly 10% amid broader market uncertainty, as a possible U.S. government shutdown looms.

results.title: Ethereum's Oldest Crisis Reborn as a $220 Million Security Fund
results.description: Unclaimed Ethereum from a decade-long hack will be staked and distributed to fund audits, tooling, and incident responses.

results.title: WallStreetBets Founder Cries Foul After Reddit Cracks Down on Miami Convention
results.description: Jaime Rogozinski litigated the trademark to the Supreme Court—and lost.

results.title: Strategy Stock ($MSTR) Hits 52-Week Low As Bitcoin Craters Below $84,000
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Strategy Stock ($MSTR) Hits 52-Week Low As Bitcoin Craters Below $84,000 Shares of Strategy ($MSTR) dropped as low as 12% today, currently trading at $140.88 and hitting a session low of $140.25. This post Strategy Stock ($MSTR) Hits 52-Week Low As Bitcoin Craters Below $84,000 first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: SEC Chair Paul Atkins to Make History as First Sitting Chair to Speak at The Bitcoin Conference in Las Vegas
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine SEC Chair Paul Atkins to Make History as First Sitting Chair to Speak at The Bitcoin Conference in Las Vegas SEC Chairman Paul Atkins is going to speak at the Bitcoin 2026 Conference. This post SEC Chair Paul Atkins to Make History as First Sitting Chair to Speak at The Bitcoin Conference in Las Vegas first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Crypto Market Structure Bill Advances Through Senate Agriculture Committee, No Democrats Vote In Favor
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Crypto Market Structure Bill Advances Through Senate Agriculture Committee, No Democrats Vote In Favor The Senate Agriculture Committee advanced a crypto market bill 12-11 along party lines. This post Crypto Market Structure Bill Advances Through Senate Agriculture Committee, No Democrats Vote In Favor first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Bitcoin Price Crashes 6% to $84,000 As Market Braces for Next Catalyst
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Bitcoin Price Crashes 6% to $84,000 As Market Braces for Next Catalyst The bitcoin price erased a rally above $90,000 in less than 24 hours as it dumped to $84,000. This post Bitcoin Price Crashes 6% to $84,000 As Market Braces for Next Catalyst first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Metaplanet Raises Up to $137 Million to Buy Bitcoin and Pay Off Debt
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Metaplanet Raises Up to $137 Million to Buy Bitcoin and Pay Off Debt Metaplanet raised up to 21 billion yen ($137 million) through share issuance as it doubles down on its strategy of accumulating bitcoin. This post Metaplanet Raises Up to $137 Million to Buy Bitcoin and Pay Off Debt first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Russia to Roll Out Bitcoin and Crypto Framework This July, Allowing Retail Participation
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Russia to Roll Out Bitcoin and Crypto Framework This July, Allowing Retail Participation Russia wants to introduce its first regulatory framework for crypto like Bitcoin, with lawmakers aiming to finalize the draft for a parliamentary vote by the end of June. This post Russia to Roll Out Bitcoin and Crypto Framework This July, Allowing Retail Participation first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Bitcoin Price Steadies Near $90,000 as Fed Pauses Rate Cuts, Powell Signals Neutral Stance
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Bitcoin Price Steadies Near $90,000 as Fed Pauses Rate Cuts, Powell Signals Neutral Stance The bitcoin price hovered near $90,000 as the Fed held rates steady and Powell signaled a neutral stance — neither tightening nor rushing new cuts. This post Bitcoin Price Steadies Near $90,000 as Fed Pauses Rate Cuts, Powell Signals Neutral Stance first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: White House to Host Crypto and Banking Executives for Talks on Stalled U.S. Crypto Bill
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine White House to Host Crypto and Banking Executives for Talks on Stalled U.S. Crypto Bill The White House is reportedly convening banking and crypto executives on February 2 to revive stalled U.S. crypto legislation, after Senate progress on market-structure rules collapsed earlier this month. This post White House to Host Crypto and Banking Executives for Talks on Stalled U.S. Crypto Bill first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.
